short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension which allows for comments and rating on any website, bypassing established censorship.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free Speech lets you comment and vote on any website, inspired by the recent changes to the Youtube dislike button and an overarching theme of increased censorship on the web.
